attributes.action: Introduce a law to turn off all unnecessary lighting on one day each month to allow the night sky to be seen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unnecessary lighting cuases so much light pollution that most people are no longer familiar with the night sky.
We accept that some level of lighting is needed to reduce crime and for safety reasons but much could be turned off at least once a month helping to make people aware of both the wastage and of the level of light pollution.
